archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0854
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want our customer databases to force the user to enter a note of explanation for access every time they exit a customer's account to ensure tight controls around customers' personal information and to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
